titleStmt.title: Christ and Moses excellency, or Sion and Sinai's glory. Being a triplex treatise, distinguishing and explaining the two covenants or the gospel and law: and directing to the right understanding applying, and finding of the informing and assuring promises, that belong to both Covenants. By Vavasor Povvell, preacher of the Gospel in Wales.
titleStmt.author: Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. I. for Hannah Allen, at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
